content.text: Anacondans were a sentient snake-like species that were spread across the galaxy.
The species were serpentine in shape, had no arms or legs, and used their long tails to grab hold of objects.
Some Anacondans, like Cinch, were adopted as pets.
An Anacondan served drinks in Trueping's during the Clone Wars. Another Anacondan, Morley, lived on Lotho Minor until his death at the hands of Savage Opress in 21 BBY.
